shortdesc.ph: Callback for setting the audio format of the callback.

section.p: When registering the audio frame observer using , you need to implement this callback. After successful registration, the SDK triggers this callback, and you can set the audio format in the return value.
section.note: The SDK triggers the callback based on the sampling interval calculation formula set in the return value. The formula is: Sampling interval (seconds) = samplePerCall / (sampleRate × channel). Make sure the sampling interval is ≥ 0.01 seconds.

section.title: Return Values
section.p: When the method call succeeds, returns an object representing the audio format of the ear monitoring data. See .
